title: An Act to create HVAC construction supervisor licensing for small businesses

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Jones of North Reading, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Bradley H. Jones, Jr., for legislation to create HVAC construction supervisor licensing.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
Reported, referred to the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure
